summary: Website project for a cloud kitchen featuring Indo-Chinese menu details.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for a cloud kitchen that clearly presents Indo-Chinese menu details, including a homepage hero section, a menu section, and basic business information sections (About and Contact).
Implement a structured Indo-Chinese menu UI with categories and item cards that show: item name, short description, price, and a veg/non-veg indicator.
Add basic filtering and search for the menu so users can quickly find items (by name/keyword) and filter by Veg/Non-Veg.
Add a Contact section that includes clearly labeled placeholders for cloud kitchen address/service area, phone number, and operating hours (stored as editable constants in the frontend code).
Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a food/restaurant brand, without using a blue-and-purple color scheme.
Add and render generated static image assets for the site (hero banner and logo), stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, and reference them from the UI (no backend routing for images).
Add an online ordering UI that lets users add menu items to a cart from the menu, adjust quantities, remove items, clear the cart, and see an order subtotal.

Add a checkout flow that collects order details (order type, customer info, delivery address when applicable, and optional special instructions) and validates required fields before allowing submission.
Connect the new checkout UI to the backend using the existing actor/React Query setup, and add a 'My Orders' view that shows the authenticated userâ€™s submitted orders.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a cloud kitchen website that presents Indo-Chinese menu details.
Add online ordering capability to the cloud kitchen website.
Implement backend order storage and APIs to create an order and retrieve orders for the currently authenticated caller (Internet Identity principal).

projectName: Cloud kitchen website for Indo-Chinese menu
